name: Oil-Sealed Rotary Vane Pump - R5 Series
description: The industry standard for reliable and robust general vacuum applications like packaging, drying, and central systems.

name: Dry Screw Vacuum Pump - COBRA Series
description: Oil-free, contact-free operation ideal for chemical, pharmaceutical, and high-purity processes. Low maintenance design.

name: Liquid Ring Vacuum Pump - Dolphin Series
description: Rugged performance in harsh conditions, particularly excellent for handling moist or saturated gases and vapor.

name: Dry Claw Vacuum Pump - MINK Series
description: An economical, dry option for rough vacuum applications like pneumatic conveying and waste treatment.
